name: Spinach and Apples
keywords: apple, pear, spinach, fall, side dish, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text:
Thinly slice 2 unripe pears and 2 crisp apples;
put on a bed of 4 cups fresh spinach. Sprinkle
with 1/4 cup raisins and drizzle with dressing.
Dressing variation: Add 2 tablespoons chopped
fresh rosemary and 1 tablespoon honey.
